instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3332: What is 820-3332? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U8900: What is U8900? This chip creates the GPU power rails on the 820-3332 board to the 2012 and early 2013 15‚Äù Retina Macbook Pros. It becomes desoldered and is the cause of no video and kernel panics/crashes in that model most of the time..
definitions.LCD_PWR_EN: What is LCD_PWR_EN? LCD_PWR_EN is a signal that tells the chip that supplies power to the LCD screen to turn on..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> lcd enable
threads.message: i cant get lcd enable to be sent, i can force backlight, i reflowed <CHIP>U8900</CHIP>, but was missing some rails, so i replaced it and the rails showed up, i now have pgood, but no matter what ive tried i cant get lcd enable to come on. im almost 100% sure this lcd is fine.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> lcd enable
threads.message: I would say try another screen just to be sure.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> lcd enable
threads.message:
Does this board really work?
Do you hear chime, get USB activity?
<SIGNAL>LCD_PWR_EN</SIGNAL> should appear in the first seconds even without screen connected.
Once <SIGNAL>LCD_HPD</SIGNAL> goes high, <SIGNAL>LCD_PWR_EN</SIGNAL> will be maintained too; if not, drops to 0V in few seconds...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> lcd enable
threads.message: still no lcd enable, but i also notice pgood is gone again, usb lights up and i do get a chime, dont have a working lcd for this one, i have 2 cracked lcd's for backlight testers
